transcription: You know I got a call from Infosys. Oh nice. Is it for software developer position? Yes, interview is next week. I'm sure you will nail it. Fingers crossed. Oh, by the way, I forgot to ask a... Did you book the tickets? Yep, 7 p.m. show at PVR. Awesome, let's go early and grab some popcorn.
